entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
